name: Unwhole
description:
Est. playtime; 1 hour

A short PICO-8 precision platformer about the pitfalls of recovery and dealing with hurting the ones you love.

- 15 stages of tough as nails platforming

- Shift into the other reality to pass obstacles

- A bittersweet story about when healing isn't enough

Controls; Left and right arrow keys to move, C to jump. Holding left or right against a wall allows you to cling onto them, while holding up while on a wall or ceiling allows you to perform a short wall or ceiling run. X shifts realities. Down interacts with benches.

This game was made over the course of eight days as my first game. I hope you enjoy it as much as I enjoyed making it, and if the message resonates with you, I hope you find peace. The movement system was partly inspired by Dustforce, so check that game out if you need your ceiling running fix.
